resources.string:
Press any of the colored buttons on your screen to try and locate a dead pixel.
Press the 'Fix' button in order to start the Pixel fixer utility.

We recommend leaving DeadPix on for at least 30 minutes.
If you need any additional support, you can visit our website or send us an e-mail.

DeadPix was created by DeadLine. This app was designed to help you out with dead pixels.
We do not claim to be able to fix any issues with your screen. This app is provided as-is.

All images were provided by Google.
